thread.title: BBC World News: Sister Monica and Siervas: The Peruvian nuns who rock
thread.title_full: BBC World News: Sister Monica and Siervas: The Peruvian nuns who rock

title: BBC World News: Sister Monica and Siervas: The Peruvian nuns who rock
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Sister Monica and Siervas: The Peruvian nuns who rock 6 February 2017 Last updated at 10:59 GMT 
Sister Monica and Siervas are a Peruvian-based rock'n'roll band comprised entirely of nuns. 
With several of the members of their convent already able to play musical instruments, this group of nuns in Lima decided to form a band. 
The nuns were invited to play for Pope Francis in Juarez, Mexico.
